name: budget-desktop-suite
description: Retro budgeting desktop and mobile wrappers
author: Budget Builder 95

scripts.cap:init: npm run prepare:web && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:add:android: npm run prepare:web && npx cap add android
scripts.cap:add:ios: npm run prepare:web && npx cap add ios
scripts.cap:open:android: npm run cap:init && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:open:ios: npm run cap:init && npx cap open ios
scripts.package:android: npm run cap:init && npx cap build android
scripts.package:ios: npm run cap:init && npx cap build ios
